The first time this weather occurs, its duration is multiplied by this percentage.

Enable the rain effect on the map.

The maximum additional multiplier for monsoon weather at maximum (no handicap). This value is affected by handicap such as Duration. Default value: 2.5 (250%), which means that when no handicap is applied (default cycle 5), the strength of all water sources is at 350%.
